fields.name: Text_Display
fields.fieldText: This service appointment has already been {!SA_Record.Status}. Further action is not possible.

fields.name: ErrorMeassage
fields.fieldText: Please make sure you upload minimum of two photos

fields.name: FaultScreen
fields.fieldText: We have an Exception when try to create DCF Infra record, please connect with Admin to resolve the issue: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.description: Created as a part of SFS-3048
screens.name: Screen1
screens.label: Screen1

fields.name: DisplayMessage
fields.fieldText: A Risk Assessment MUST be carried before works begin. The Risk Assessment MUST take into account the road layout and speed of traffic, the task to be carried out location,duration,and restoration or site to its original state. This may identify additional signing lighting and guarding to ensure the safety of road users and operatives. Ask yourself the following questions for all mobile and short duration activities and use the red book for guidance.

fields.name: Are_there_any_parking_restrictions_single_or_double_yellow_lines
fields.fieldText: Are there any parking restrictions - single or double yellow lines ?

fields.name: Will_your_parking_cause_hazard_to_other_vehicles_cyclists_or_horse_riders
fields.fieldText: Will your parking cause hazard to other vehicles, cyclists or horse riders ?

fields.name: Will_your_parking_cause_obstruction_or_a_hazard_to_pedestrians_by_reducing_acces
fields.fieldText: Will your parking cause obstruction or a hazard to pedestrians by reducing access or visibility?

fields.name: Will_your_parking_cause_obstruction_to_access
fields.fieldText: Will your parking cause obstruction to access?

screens.description: Created as a part of SFS-3048 Updated as a part of SFS-4486
screens.name: Screen_2
screens.label: Screen 2

fields.name: DisplayText
fields.fieldText: Take into account all considerations for what type of works will you be undertaking and what equipment will you need:

fields.name: Short_Duration_Work_less_than_15minutes_two_way_traffic
fields.fieldText: Short Duration Work less than 15minutes two - way traffic
fields.helpText: If Yes consult page 87 and table inside rear of ACOP for layout of works

fields.name: Short_Duration_Work_more_than_15_minutes_two_way_traffic
fields.fieldText: Short Duration Work more than 15 minutes - two way traffic
fields.helpText: If Yes consult page 89 and table inside rear of ACOP for layout of works

fields.name: Short_Duration_Work_more_than_15_minutes_give_take_traffic
fields.fieldText: Short Duration Work more than 15 minutes - give take traffic
fields.helpText: If Yes consult page 89 and table inside rear of ACOP for layout of works

fields.name: Duration_in_excess_of_60_minutes
fields.fieldText: Duration in excess of 60 minutes
fields.helpText: If Yes, seek advice from your line manager in relation to notice requirements to Highways

fields.name: Any_additional_signs_supplementary_plates_or_cones_required
fields.fieldText: Any additional signs, supplementary plates or cones required?
fields.helpText: If Yes, action taken to address

fields.name: Is_it_safe_to_undertake_the_tasks_at_this_location_and_this_time
fields.fieldText: Is it safe to undertake the task at this location and this time?
fields.helpText: If the answer to any of the below questions is no, please take action to address

fields.name: Will_your_task_maintain_access_for_vehicular_traffic
fields.fieldText: Will your tasks maintain access for vehicular traffic?

fields.name: Will_your_task_maintain_access_for_cyclists_and_horse_riders
fields.fieldText: Will your tasks maintain access for cyclists and horse riders?

fields.name: Will_your_task_maintain_access_for_pedestrians
fields.fieldText: Will your tasks maintain access for pedestrians?

fields.name: Are_the_task_to_be_undertaken_of_low_risk_to_yourself_and_members_of_the_public
fields.fieldText: Are the tasks to be undertaken of low risk to yourself and members of the public?

fields.name: Will_works_be_undertaken_in_the_centre_of_a_two_way_road
fields.fieldText: Will works be undertaken in the centre of a two way road?
fields.helpText: If Yes refer to page 39

fields.name: Are_the_works_at_a_side_road_near_a_T_junction
fields.fieldText: Are the works at a side road near a T junction?
fields.helpText: If Yes refer to page 44

fields.name: Are_works_near_a_roundabout
fields.fieldText: Are works near a roundabout?
fields.helpText: If Yes refer to page 48-49

fields.name: Further_comments
fields.fieldText: Further comments

screens.label: Screen 3

fields.name: Note4
fields.fieldText: Vehicle requirements: Must be conspicuous with rear chevron high vis markings 360 degrees amber beacon keep left/right signage (Page 91)

fields.fieldText: Provide details of job being undertaken:
